name: Scream Bird - new voice control game
name_original: Scream Bird - new voice control game
description:
A new voice control game came——Scream Bird.
The gameplay is novel, and the art is unique.

Regardless of day and night,
whether at home or in public,
people scream for it madly.

Why?
● Scream Bird's characters are so cute that you can't stop playing with them.
● Easy to play. Be quiet means stop, whisper means walk, scream means jump. That's all.
● Strong skills. Completing a variety of challenging missions requires strong voice control skills. If you like Power Rangers Legacy Wars, you must like this.

Every player has their own way to scream.
How about you and your friend?
You must want to know.
Just join us and share it with your friends!
